      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Addition of strong acid to a solution of sodium phenoxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung der starken Säure zu einer Lösung 
von Natriumphenoxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajout d'acide fort à une solution de phenoxide 
de sodium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adição do ácido forte a uma solução do 
phenoxide do sodium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiunta di acido forte ad una soluzione del 
phenoxide del sodio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσθήκη του ισχυρού οξέος σε μια λύση του 
phenoxide νατρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adición del ácido fuerte a una solución del 
phenoxide del sodio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for reaction of sodium phenoxide with a strong acid forming the weak acid, phenol, and the strong base, sodium ion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium phenoxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für Reaktion 
von Natriumphenoxide mit einer starken Säure, welche die schwache 
Säure, Phenol und die starke Unterseite, Natriumion bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
réaction du phenoxide de sodium avec de l'acide fort formant l'acide 
faible, le phénol, et la base forte, ion de sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para a 
reação do phenoxide do sodium com um ácido forte que dá forma ao 
ácido fraco, ao phenol, e à base forte, íon do sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per 
reazione del phenoxide del sodio con un acido forte che forma l'acido 
debole, il fenolo e la base forte, ione del sodio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για την 
αντίδραση του phenoxide νατρίου με ένα ισχυρό οξύ που 
διαμορφώνει το ασθενές οξύ, τη φαινόλη, και την ισχυρή βάση, 
ιόν νατρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
reacción del phenoxide del sodio con un ácido fuerte que forma el 
ácido débil, el fenol, y la base fuerte, ion del sodio.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
